title: [Flawless]Server-amd64-RC1.iso
description:
What's the [Flawless] Server?

The [Flawless] Server is a Linux Cloud Media Server OS that's sole focus is acquiring and distributing media throughout the home and beyond. It does this by leveraging some very cool automated content acquisition software, then makes it available via two powerful library managers, Plex and Madsonic (a Subsonic mod). Using a Linux Mint base, it is a remix of the popular OS enabling the [Flawless] Server to directly benefit from their solid and stable approach to Linux development.
What is a Cloud Media Server?

    Massive Storage (Local/Cloud) - Tons of storage on a singular volume to hold everything you have (movies, music, tv shows, pictures, files, programs, PC backups, phone backups, etc).  
    Automated Acquisition - Easily and automatically grow your media library with movies, music, tv shows, etc, through the use of some awesome programs.
    Agnostic Distribution - Windows, Apple, Linux, Android, iOS, PS3, Set-top, Stream, DLNA, local. It does't matter, access it all on any device, anywhere.

What Is A Linux Mint Remix?

The [Flawless] Server is a remix of the powerful and stable Linux Mint Ubuntu based distro using Customizer. A Linux Remix is a customized version of a LiveCD/Installer that has been remastered for a specific purpose or objective.

 
Specs

Base Image

    Linux Mint 15 MATE AMD64 (md5 5-24-2013)

    Madsonic (Subsonic Mod)

    Sickbeard
    CouchPotatoServer
    Headphones

    ownCloud
    PeerGuardian
    SnapRAID

    XRDP
    openssh-server
    system-config-samba
